review.title: “Great small business, working as a team ilke a small family unit.”
review.pros: Pros – Non pressured environment,where everyone has a say and is a valued member of the team.Great location to live and work.
review.cons: Cons – There is not the opportunity to expand and grow the business without outside finance becoming available.Training courses are sometimes unaffordable.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be more proactive and aggressive in the market place.
review.recommended: – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
